FuncDef: The reset mpls oam statistic-type l2vc command clears MPLS OAM performance statistics for a PW.
CLIs: reset mpls oam statistic-type { lost-measure single-ended | delay-measure two-way } l2vc peer-ip <peer-ip-value> vc-id <vc-id-value> vc-type <vc-type-value>

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about frame loss measurement.
-

Clears statistics about single-ended frame loss measurement.
-

Clears statistics about frame delay measurement.
-

Clears statistics about two-way frame delay measurement.
-

Specifies the destination IP address of a PW.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the PW ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the type of a remote L2VC.
Encapsulation types supported:ATM PWE3atm-1to1-vcc: One PW carries the ATM cells of one PVC.atm-1to1-vpc: One PW carries the ATM cells of one PVP.atm-aal5-pdu: One PW carries the AAL5 PDUs of one PVC.atm-aal5-sdu: One PW carries the AAL5 SDUs of one PVC.atm-nto1-vcc: One PW carries the ATM cells of multiple PVCs.atm-nto1-vpc: One PW carries the ATM cells of multiple PVPs.atm-trans-cell: ATM cells are transmitted over PWE3 VCs.
TDM PWE3cesopsn-basic: CES is sensitive to E1 and T1 frame structures. E1 or T1 signals can be encapsulated into packets based on timeslots.satop-e1: SAToP is insensitive to the E1 frame structure and encapsulates a whole E1 frame into a PW packet.satop-t1: SAToP is insensitive to the T1 frame structure and encapsulates a whole T1 frame into a PW packet.
Other encapsulation types:cep: This encapsulation type is used for CEP services.ethernet: This encapsulation type is used when Ethernet packets do not carry VLAN information.hdlc: HDLC is a bit-oriented link layer protocol.ip-interworking: This encapsulation type is used for interworking between Huawei devices.ip-layer2: This encapsulation type is used for interworking between Huawei devices and non-Huawei devices.ppp: PPP is a link layer protocol that specifies how to encapsulate and transmit network layer packets over P2P links.vlan: This encapsulation type is used when Ethernet packets carry VLAN information.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] reset mpls oam statistic-type lost-measure single-ended l2vc peer-ip 2.2.2.2 vc-id 11 vc-type vlan
ExtraInfo: To clear statistics about single-ended frame loss measurement, run the reset mpls oam statistic-type lost-measure single-ended l2vc peer-ip peer-ip vc-id vc-id vc-type vc-type command.To clear statistics about two-way frame delay measurement, run the reset mpls oam statistic-type delay-measure two-way l2vc peer-ip peer-ip vc-id vc-id vc-type vc-type command.
